content:
Hmm baa-hoo~ I specially asked Mr. Mobai about it,
and he said we don't have our own bubble world outfits yet,
sounds like a pretty fluffy idea, don't you think?
info: 闲聊-玩家穿着基础服装的闲聊-12绵朵_单一闲聊

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, I thought your outfit was what we call a "bubble outfit" in our world,
but that description {短暂停}sounds like something you'd eat, baa...
